title: Mitochondrial function comes into focus in PMD trial
summary: PMD trial ties functional measures with NAD⁺ and redox biomarkers, offering a pragmatic view of mitochondrial modulation. Primary mitochondrial disease (PMD) rarely attracts broad attention outside specialist circles, yet it sits uncomfortably close to the fault lines of modern geroscience.
